value.title: Add measures in bulk to your Power BI file without external tools
value.excerpt: In todays video I am going to show you how to add measures in bulk to Power BI without using external tools. Why you may ask?  Well, it is very common that users can not install third party software on their computers or you might not want to learn a new tool.   Enjoy!  Here you can download all the

value.title: DAX Fridays #200: Calculate the MAX of a measure

Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE to learn more about Power and Excel BI! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ7UhloHSA4wAqPzyi6TOkw?sub_confirmation=1
